notes: MakingCosmetics is a popular supplier for small-scale cosmetic manufacturers, DIY formulators, and product developers seeking accessible postbiotic ingredients. They offer a variety of Lactobacillus and Saccharomyces ferment ingredients in small quantities perfect for prototyping and testing formulations before scaling to production. With affordable pricing, quick shipping, and no minimum order requirements, MakingCosmetics makes postbiotic ingredients accessible to startups and small manufacturers who want to experiment with microbiome-focused formulations. They also provide educational resources and formulation tips to support formulators at all levels.
